titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 644) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend and expand the charitable deduction for contributions of food inventory, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 636) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend increased expensing limitations, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-23, by Mr. Cole.
The resolution provides for consideration of both H.R. 644 and H.R. 636 under closed rules.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 9.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 101.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on the resolution, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. McGovern demanded the Yeas and Nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on the question of ordering the previous question until a time to be announced.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 232 - 164 (Roll no. 77).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 163 (Roll no. 78).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/10/2015--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 644) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend and expand the charitable deduction for contributions of food inventory, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 636) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend increased expensing limitations.
